Engineered for Perfection

We don't just print stickers. We create industrial-grade automotive emblems designed to outlast your car.

Fully Custom

Any design, any artwork. If you can imagine it, we can print it in 4K quality.

Hand-Made Quality

Crafted with care, not mass-produced. Each sticker is hand-domed for perfection.

Built to Last

Weather-resistant resin coating that survives car washes, UV rays, and extreme roads.

Global Trust

13,000+ sets sold internationally to car enthusiasts in over 120 countries.

Risk-Free

14-day free returns & 30-day money back guarantee. Peace of mind included.

Premium Finish

High-gloss domed effect that gives your wheels a factory-new premium look.

Common Questions

Everything you need to know about our domed stickers.

Yes! We use premium industrial-grade adhesive designed specifically for automotive use. They are heat, cold, and water resistant.
Absolutely. We use 4K resolution printing to ensure your custom design is crisp, vibrant, and sharp, even for intricate logos.
Yes, that's what we specialize in! You can upload any image or logo, and we'll turn it into a premium 3D domed emblem.
Our stickers are coated with a UV-resistant optical resin that prevents yellowing and fading. We back them with a 5-year durability warranty.
We offer a 14-day free return policy and a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not happy, we'll make it right.
Yes, we ship worldwide! We have satisfied customers in over 120 countries.
Very easy. Just clean the surface with alcohol, peel the backing, and stick it on. No tools required.
